result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lauren A. FREE

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: All records scanned and verified.

Defendant in custody.   
State moves to dismiss and read in this file, the defendant entered pleas in Case Files 15 CF 575, 15 CF 685, 15 CF 698, and 15 CF 422.   Motion granted.   
Minutes.
Plea date at 03-02-2016 02:00 pm

Defendant in custody.
Arraignment held for cases 15CF685 and 15CF698.
Settlement conference with D.A. is set for 02-11-16 at 8:30 a.m
Plea date is set for 06-01-16 at 2:30 p.m.
Minutes.

Stipulation and Order to Amend Criminal Bond.
It is ordered that the bond be amended to eliminate the requirement that she "report to the Manitowoc County Jail every Monday and Wednesday for drug screenings".  All other conditions of bond are ordered to remain in effect. 
Copy to jail.
Cover letter.

Defendant in custody.
This case is riding along with 15 CF 685 and 698 which is set for arraignment on 02-08-16 at 9:00 a.m.
Minutes.
Status conference at 01-06-2016 09:00 am

Settlement Conference Summary.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is reset to 12/15/2015, at 9:30 a.m.
Settlement conference with DA set for 11-17-15 at 1:15 p.m.

Stipulation and Order to Amend Criminal Bond.
It is hereby ordered that the defendant's bond be amended to eliminate the requirement that she have no contact with Michael Rocklewitz.  All other conditions of bond remain in effect.
Copy to jail.
Cover letter.

ADDRESS INFO for Lauren A. FREE
Current: 526 N. 10th Street #1, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 10-07-2015)
Prior: 2519 16th Street, Two Rivers, WI 54241
Plea date is set for 10-19-15 at 1:30 p.m.

Settlement Conference Summary.
Plea hearing is set for 10-19-15 at 1:30 p.m.
Plea/sentencing hearing set for 10-19-15 at 1:30 p.m.
Defendant's Discovery Demand.

Defendant failed to appear.   
State files an Amended Criminal Complaint charging misdemeanor retail theft, contrary to Section 943.50(1m)(b) of the Wisconsin Statutes.  Court will hold off on the warrant until 09-23-15 at 1:15 p.m. to see if she shows for her settlement conference with the District Attorney.  
Minutes.
Philip Hoff, through Public Defender.
RE:  Bail jumping, on 07-27-15.
Amended the reporting condition to submit to discretionary drug screenings. (Per Commissioner Koppa)

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of bail jumping and retail theft.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 09-21-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $2,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that she have no contact with Walmart at 4115 Calumet Avenue, Manitowoc, WI, any known drug suppliers, Michael Rochlewitz and Joshua Richmond; that she provide proof of treatment to the DA's office; maintain absolute sobriety and report to the Manitowoc County Jail every Monday and Wednesday for drug screenings.  Bail furnished and the defendant is released from custody.
Minutes.
